Name Recipes/Basic/Squares

Synopsis Print a list of squares
Examples How can we print a list of squares? Here is a solution: 
module demo::basic::Squares

import IO;                                   

// Print a table of squares

public void squares(int N){
  println("Table of squares from 1 to <N>"); 
  for(int I <- [1 .. N])
      println("<I> squared = <I * I>");      
}
At the IO module is imported since we want to print things using println.

String interpolation is used here several times. In the value of N is inserted in the header message and in the values of I and I * I are inserted in each line that is printed.

Here is how square can be used: 
rascal>import demo::basic::Squares;
ok
rascal>squares(9);
Table of squares from 1 to 9
1 squared = 1
2 squared = 4
3 squared = 9
4 squared = 16
5 squared = 25
6 squared = 36
7 squared = 49
8 squared = 64
9 squared = 81
ok
